Text:
hi SAILO

waiting for a rating

So tell me, is this the real deal?
Thanks for the upload in any case!
I downloaded this just burned it 17 min in a cinavia msg comes up temporary mute but its for the rest of the movie WTF
The English subs are not good. Some text is missing or incorrect, and there are a lot of grammatical mistakes.
Thx for all uploads. Greatings from Norway
